definition: a row/a line/to set in order/to arrange/to line up/to eliminate/to drain/to push open/platoon/raft/classifier for lines, rows etc
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Position the hose at a downspout drain to discharge then let go of the crimp.
sentences.chinese: 位置處於降排水軟管燃放然後放過了捲曲。

sentences.english: Drainage was to the north and individual channels bifurcate in that direction .
sentences.chinese: 整個水系向北排水，各個河道朝該方向分叉。

sentences.english: DRAIN】You should dig trenches to drain away the water.
All drain traps shall be approved type and manufacture.
sentences.chinese: 所有排水裝置及存水彎的類型及生產廠家應經認可。

sentences.english: But How Do You Get the Guys to Remember to Open the Drain?
sentences.chinese: 你又怎麼讓人記着打開排水溝呢？

sentences.english: The coffee grains plug ged up the kitchen drain.
sentences.chinese: 咖啡渣堵塞了廚房的排水道。

sentences.english: Drying machine of the filter before adding the automatic device should be drainage.
sentences.chinese: 乾燥機之前的過濾器應加裝自動排水器。

sentences.english: It is a good thing that this park has excellent drainage.
sentences.chinese: 這個公園的排水系統很好是件好事。

sentences.english: B. Connect the drainage accessory with the coupler.
sentences.chinese: 將排水配件和連結器連接起來。

sentences.english: Officials say its the highest drainage project of its kind in the world.
sentences.chinese: 官方人員稱，這是世界上海拔最高的排水工程。
砌體暗渠取代混凝土排水溝。

sentences.english: Probably endemic to the River Cross drainage in Cameroon.
sentences.chinese: 也許有種裏弗克羅斯在喀麥隆排水。

sentences.english: The synthetic-rubber track can be used in all weathers on condition that the drainage facilities are good.
sentences.chinese: 塑膠跑道在排水設施完善的條件下，可供全天候使用。

sentences.english: To construct drainage adits within the boundary of the Pok Fu Lam Country Park and Special Area.
sentences.chinese: 於薄扶林郊野公園及特別地區內建造地下排水道。

sentences.english: Drainage and quality topsoil are essential to growth of the fine turf.
sentences.chinese: 排水和表土對將來草坪的生長非常重要。

sentences.english: This land drains into the Mississippi.
sentences.chinese: 該地區向密西西比河排水。

definition: to collect water/to be covered with water/to pond/accumulated water/ponding
